product_description: What Is A C-clamp? A C-clamp is a type of clamping device that is used to hold a wood or metal workpiece, usually in carpentry or welding. It is a popular belief that C clamps are named after the resemblance between the look of the clamp and the letter “C” What is a C-clamp used for? C-clamps are commonly used in carpentry and woodworking to hold materials to the work surface while cutting or drilling is ongoing, and the C-clamp can also be used to hold joints together while they are glued. name: C Clamp, Heavy Duty C-Clamp 304 Stainless Steel Adjustable Cabinet Installation Clamps Cabinetry Clamps Tools Drill Hole Guide Design for Easy and Fast Installing Frame of Cabinets Drawer (2 Pack)
short_description: 【Quick Installation】: This C clamp 2 inchc frees up your hands for easier and more accurate installation and repair of cabinets, tables, desktops, furniture and more. Suitable for sheet objects of different sizes and thicknesses and materials (e.g. acrylic, glass, wood, iron and stone). The jig remains operational when the drawer is closed.

【Easy to Use】: The drawer face clamp have an adjustable positioning screw, you just need to tighten the thumbscrew at the desired position on the clamp, fix it and drill the holes. Easily aligned to drawer fronts or cabinet door frames, with a flexible drilling guide for pre-drilling and installing screws, the professional cabinet clamps can be installed in minutes.

【Durable】: The cabinet installation tools are made from one-piece cold rolled steel with an electrostatic coating and an I-beam design to provide some strength, rust and scratch resistance for long life.

【Anti-slip Design】: The furniture clamps uses anti-slip friction rubber pads to improve the stability of the jig, and the rubber pads on the clamp components prevent damage to the cabinet surface during installation.
【Reinforced Design】: The reinforced design at the elbow ensures that the clamped object is not easily deformed, the structure is strong and sturdy and easy to adjust.
